{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Flag football {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Flag football Flag football is a variant of American football where, instead of tackling players to the ground, the defensive team must remove a flag or flag belt from the ball carrier ("deflagging") to end a down, and contact is not permitted between players. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag football)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
